Package com.fssa.needstobedone.exception

package com.fssa.needstobedone.exception
This package contains user-defined exceptions that help the needs to be done portal to handle unexpected situations. It includes exceptions for problems related to services, data access, and validation.

Each exception in this package tells the program when something unexpected happens. For example, if a service can't work properly, a Service Exception can be called to let the program know about it.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.fssa.needstobedone
    This package is like the main control room of the needs to be done portal.
    com.fssa.needstobedone.dao
    This package contains Data Access Object (DAO) classes that handle database interactions for various entities.
    com.fssa.needstobedone.model
    This package has classes that represent different modules in the needs to be done portal.
    com.fssa.needstobedone.services
    This package has classes that manage different parts of the needs to be done portal.
    com.fssa.needstobedone.utils
    This package includes useful helpers for various tasks in the app.
    com.fssa.needstobedone.validation
    This package contains classes responsible for validating data inputs and ensuring they meet specific criteria.
  • Exceptions
    Class
    Description
    DAOException
    Custom exception class for handling data access related exceptions in the DAO layer.
    ServiceException
    Custom exception class for handling service-related exceptions.
    ValidationException
    Custom exception class for handling validation-related exceptions.
